id: scenario-value-scanner-parent-scenarios-household-coordinating children's different developmental needs in household
title: Coordinating children's different developmental needs in household
description: Coordinating children's different developmental needs in household
content:
Scenario: Coordinating children's different developmental needs in household
    Given Tommy (5) needs wonder-preservation
    And Emma (8) needs autonomy-building
    When Sarah coordinates household routines
    Then the household_elohim should help balance different needs
    And it should suggest how to serve both children appropriately
    And it should track whether each child's needs are being met
    And developmental coordination should be recognized as complex work
    And Sarah's skilled navigation of competing needs should be valued
    And household care should serve all members' flourishing
